meanings.sent1: The depletable resources were running low.
meanings.sent2: It is important to consider the depletable nature of our energy sources.
meanings.sent3: The depletable snacks disappeared quickly at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was depletable, like a well that had run dry.
meanings.sent5: The depletable water in the bottle reminded him to conserve it.

meanings.definition: Able to be used up or exhausted.
meanings.sent1: The depletable batteries needed to be replaced.
meanings.sent2: We must be mindful of our depletable financial resources.
meanings.sent3: His depletable energy was evident after a long day at work.
meanings.sent4: The depletable time slipped away like sand through his fingers.
meanings.sent5: The depletable soil could no longer support the crops.
